text: Limnaea or Limnaia () or Limnaeum or Limnaion (Λιμναίον) was a town of Histiaeotis in ancient Thessaly, taken by the Romans in 191 BCE. Its location is within the bounds of the modern town of Vlochos. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Histiaeotis
title: Limnaea (Thessaly)
